text:
Students took out an awareness rally in the town stressing importance of tree plantation, growing and protecting trees and environment protection here on Sunday.

The rally that started from Kodaikanal municipality ended at Moonjikkal after passing through prime roads, including seven roads and Anna Road.

They stressed growing of more trees in vacant lands near residential areas and in open areas to improve the green cover and to protect the environment. Later, Lions Club members and students planted saplings at various places in the town.
title: Awareness rally taken out
